thread.section_title: Hiberia Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very Good
thread.title_full: Very Good - Review of Hiberia Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: HONESTREVIEWER6968
title: Very Good
text:
Hotel Hiberia is in an excellent location - very central and near to the sights and within walking distance.
Breakfast had a good choice, hot and cold products and coffee machine.
Room not huge but good for what we needed - we did not intend sitting in the room all day! A bit tired but clean, shower good, fridge, hair dryer and toiletries provided. Plenty of towels. Air con not great but not a problem for us. Leak in the shower fixed straight away. Lift dated but okay. Building is traditional with character and not an ultra modern box.
Reasonable price booked through booking.com and we feel good value for money
The best part of our stay at the Hotel was Raphael on reception. He was pleasant, polite and helpful all times. He is a credit to the hotel as his customer service is excellent. A refreshing change!
We would book here again and would recommend it. It is old style and typically Italian but welcoming and comfortable, ideal for a stay in Rome and sight seeing. Good customer service and we felt safe here.
